meanings.definition: Stegosaurs: a group of herbivorous dinosaurs characterized by their distinctive plates and spikes along their backs.
meanings.sent1: The stegosaurs roamed the prehistoric lands, displaying their unique plates and spikes.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study stegosaurs to learn more about their ancient environment.
meanings.sent3: The stegosaurs decided to have a fashion show to show off their trendy plates and spikes.
meanings.sent4: In a world full of plain creatures, the stegosaurs stood out like majestic kings with their regal adornments.
meanings.sent5: Children love reading about stegosaurs in books because of their cool armor-like features.
